name: Deluxe Room
summary: This room assigned to two people. May have one or more beds.
description: Deluxe rooms, are modern decorated, can accommodate up to 2 persons, totally soundproofed and equipped with high tech comforts such as high speed internet access, USB ports , smart TV, room cleaning touch system and private hydromassage bathtub.

name: Standard Room
summary: A room with a queen-sized bed. May be occupied by one or more people.
description: This room is modern decorated that can accommodate up to 2 persons, totally soundproofed and equipped with high tech comforts such as high speed internet access, USB ports , smart TV and room cleaning touch system.

name: Double Room
summary: A room assigned to two people. May have one or more beds.
description: Double rooms, are modern decorated, can accommodate up to 2 persons, totally soundproofed and equipped with high tech comforts such as high speed internet access, USB ports , smart TV, room cleaning touch system and private hydromassage bathtub.

name: Classic Room
summary: Classic bedrooms at this Hotel are perfect for a one night city hotel break in Belfast.
description: Our beautiful Classic bedrooms are the smallest bedrooms available in the hotel. These compact bedrooms are perfectly formed, designed with style and comfort in mind and feature all of the modern amenities you would expect from a four star Hotel.

name: Triple Classic Room
summary: A room that can accommodate three persons and has been fitted with three twin beds, one double bed and one twin bed or two double beds.
description: These room furnished in typical Sardinian style, have either two separate single beds or one double bed with extra bed, and come complete with the following features: hair dryer, bathroom amenities, direct-dial telephone, TV , safety deposit box (in the room or at Reception), air conditioning/heating period and times planned, wireless internet connection, minibar, Eletric Kettle (free basic kit of the / coffee),and balcony.

name: Business Class Room
summary: When work brings you to Dhaka, our 66 Business Class Rooms offer you unbeatable efficiency and comfort
description: Located on floors 16 through 19, these modern rooms feature stunning city views and a choice of a king bed or two twin beds. Turndown service will prepare your memory foam mattress with premium down bedding to ensure a restful stay. In addition to all standard amenities, take advantage of our dry-cleaning services and complimentary evening cocktails with access to the Business Class lounge. Accessible room options are available.

name: Royal Class Room
summary: Located on our hotel’s 18th floor, our Royal Suite features the upscale elegance of a private deck with an infinity pool.
description: A plush king-size bed with premium bedding, a separate living and dining area, and a second bedroom with a bathroom and a king bed make you feel at home. Lavish furnishings and a bathroom with a whirlpool are just a few of the highlights of this extravagant suite. All standard amenities are included, along with a welcome drink and a fruit platter on arrival, daily turndown service, and complimentary laundering of four pieces of clothing. Ask about complimentary meeting room use.

name: Economy Classic Room
summary: A room with a queen-sized bed. May be occupied by one or more people.
description: Each room is a little piece of tranquillity that offers guests an intimate and comfortable atmosphere that leads to relaxation. All Classic Economy Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with large marble vanities, tub or shower and an exclusive selection of amenities. These rooms are available with queen size bed and can accommodate one person.

name: Presedential Suite
summary: Spread out in the magnificent Presidential Suite, which features two stunning bedrooms with plush king-size beds.
description: Offering a separate living room, a dining room, and a modern meeting room, these lavish accommodations provide an ideal venue for entertaining guests or hosting small meetings. In addition to a spa-like bathroom with a whirlpool, this 18th-floor suite treats you to spectacular views of the city from the private balcony with its own infinity pool. All standard amenities apply, along with daily fruit platters (on request), complimentary incoming faxes, and turndown service.
